idea-plugin.name: AceJump
idea-plugin.description: AceJump allows you to quickly navigate the cursor to any position visible in the editor. See a demo of AceJump in action! Simply hit "ctrl+;", type a character, then type the matching character to Ace Jump.
idea-plugin.change-notes: <html> <dl> <dt>3.0.2</dt> <dd>Fixes target mode and default shortcut activation for Mac users.</dd> <dt>3.0.1</dt> <dd>Fixes target-mode issues affecting users with non-default shortcuts and adds support for Home/End.</dd> <dt>3.0.0</dt> <dd>Major release: Re-written from the ground up. Lots of new features: https://github.com/johnlindquist/AceJump#history <dt>2.0.13</dt> <dd>Fix a regression affecting target mode and line-based navigation</dd> <dt>2.0.12</dt> <dd>Fix ClassCastException when input letter not present: https://github.com/johnlindquist/AceJump/issues/73</dd> <dt>2.0.11</dt> <dd>One hundred percent all natural Kotlin.</dd> <dt>2.0.10</dt> <dd>Support 2016.2, remove upper version limit, update internal Kotlin version</dd> <dt>2.0.9</dt> <dd>Compile on Java 7 to address: https://github.com/johnlindquist/AceJump/issues/61</dd> <dt>2.0.8</dt> <dd>Compile on Java 6 to address: https://github.com/johnlindquist/AceJump/issues/59</dd> <dt>2.0.7</dt> <dd>Language update for Kotlin 1.0 release.</dd> <dt>2.0.6</dt> <dd>Fixing "lost focus" bugs mentioned here: https://github.com/johnlindquist/AceJump/issues/41</dd> <dt>2.0.5</dt> <dd>Fixing "backspace" bugs mentioned here: https://github.com/johnlindquist/AceJump/issues/20</dd> <dt>2.0.4</dt> <dd>Fixing "code folding" bugs mentioned here: https://github.com/johnlindquist/AceJump/issues/24</dd> <dt>2.0.3</dt> <dd>More work on Ubuntu focus bug</dd> <dt>2.0.2</dt> <dd>Fixed bug when there's only 1 search result</dd> <dt>2.0.1</dt> <dd>Fixing Ubuntu focus bug</dd> <dt>2.0.0</dt> <dd>Major release: Added "target mode", many speed increases, multi-char search implemented</dd> <dt>1.1.0</dt> <dd>Switching to Kotlin for the code base</dd> <dt>1.0.4</dt> <dd>Fixing https://github.com/johnlindquist/AceJump/issues/9 and https://github.com/johnlindquist/AceJump/issues/6</dd> <dt>1.0.3</dt> <dd>Fixed minor visual lag when removing the "jumpers" from the editor</dd> <dt>1.0.2</dt> <dd>Cleaning up minor bugs (npe when editor not in focus, not removing layers)</dd> <dt>1.0.1</dt> <dd>Adding a new jump: "Enter" will take you to the first non-whitespace char in a new line (compare to "Home" which takes you to a new line)</dd> <dt>1.0</dt> <dd>Cleaned up code base for release</dd> </dl> </html>
